<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"account_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["debit","credit","transfer"]},"amount":{"type":"string","description":"Decimal string"},"asset":{"type":"string","example":"BTC"},"description":{"type":"string"},"metadata":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true},"destination_account_username":{"type":"string","description":"For transfer type: destination account"}},"required":["account_id","type","amount","asset"],"title":"CreateTransactionRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
